ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD; Automatic CDS sensor
Built in f 4~9mm varifocal lens. 540 Horizontal Resolution TV Lines
Weatherproof aluminum housing. NTSC system
36 IR leds for night vision. Minimal Illumination, 0 LUX
Package included: 1 x Sony CCD security camera, 1 x 12V DC power supply, 1 x camera extension cable, 1 x mini pre-Amp microphone and 1 x security warning sticker
